participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my ability to maintain my sanity in the face of the madness that is Toronto summer.
i working in a publishing building.
I play sports with my family and friends to stay fit and have fun.
I would like to be reincarnated as a cat so I can sleep all day and eat sushi whenever I want.
i like to drink.

participant_2.background:
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.
i love to play basketball.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
I love Christmas because I get to spend time with my family and eat lots of delicious food.
I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

content.text: Hey! good just finished a game of basketball and now im eating pistachio ice cream
haha nice! pistachio ice cream is delicious!
I know right! I always love it in the summer
I work in a publishing building and I love it!
That's so cool! I love reading and I love books so that would be a great job for me
It is really fun! I get to read all day and I get to see a lot of cool new books before they even come out
That's really awesome! I wish I had that job
It's pretty great! I love it
Well I'm glad you like your job!
Thanks! I do! What do you do for work?
I babysit for the woman who lives next door
That sounds like a fun job! I love kids
It is! I love getting to spend time with them and I love helping them learn new things
That's great! I'm sure they love having you as their babysitter
I hope so! I love making them laugh and I love seeing their excitement when they learn something new
That's so sweet! I'm sure they are lucky to have you
Thank you! I try my bes
